presentations.title: Quantum Chromodynamics and the Proton Spin Crisis
presentations.abstract: Recent advances in understanding the proton spin structure through lattice QCD calculations and experimental measurements.

presentations.title: Nuclear Structure in Neutron-Rich Isotopes Near the Drip Line
presentations.abstract: Experimental investigation of exotic nuclear structures in neutron-rich isotopes approaching the neutron drip line.

presentations.title: Heavy-Ion Collisions and the Quark-Gluon Plasma
presentations.abstract: Analysis of collective flow and jet quenching in ultra-relativistic heavy-ion collisions at RHIC and LHC energies.

presentations.title: Nuclear Reactions for Astrophysics: The r-process
presentations.abstract: Theoretical calculations of nuclear reaction rates relevant to rapid neutron capture process nucleosynthesis.

presentations.title: Chiral Effective Field Theory in Nuclear Physics
presentations.abstract: Systematic approach to nuclear forces and currents using chiral effective field theory.
